text: وَكَذَّبُوا۟ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓا۟ أَهْوَآءَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلُّ أَمْرٍ مُّسْتَقِرٌّ

translation.en.sahih: And they denied and followed their inclinations. But for every matter is a [time of] settlement.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan mereka mendutakan (Nabi) dan mengikuti hawa nafsu mereka, sedang tiap-tiap urusan telah ada ketetapannya
